TopicTitle: Oops! Houston we have a problem!

Articles.Content: Okay so when i want to land at a rocket on the mun or minumus i use mechjeb and use the co-ordinates and every time the degrees would be of by a bit but this time it was dead accurate is this is what happened! Here come a rescue mission with a habitat.

Almost did the same thing. I built a little munbase but I wanted a kind of lifeboat for the guys on the mun, something that could get them all home in a hurry. Built a massive lander that seats 8 and returns to Kerbal in two pieces. nearly crushed the munbase with the lifeboat on landing. Had to snatch the controls away from MechJeb at the last second and do a manual landing. Close call but no injuries, did roast one of the solar panels at the munbase though.
Ah dam ills going to take control but i though it would make it lose power faster and dropp plus before landing i was looking for the panic button lol Failed.
